attributes.action: Stop £82 Billion per year going to waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government currently wastes more than £82 Billion per year on bungled projects and overspending. This is enough to give every family in the UK more than £4,000 every year! The Government MUST commit itself seriously for the first time to greatly reducing this gross mismanagement of our money by proposing immediate solutions.
